Name: UCSB
Description: A great university located along the California coast!

Name: Isla Vista
Description: A unicorporated community with many friendly people and delicious food there.

Name: Yellowstone National Park
Description: The national park that provides you so many chances to get in touch with wild animals.

Name: Huangshan (Yellow Mountain)
Description: The mountain range in my hometown that is known for peculiarly-shaped peaks, Huangshan pine trees, hot springs and view of clouds.

Name: Singapore Botanic Gardens
Description: The garden you have to go when visiting Singapore. Beautiful exterior scene and deliberate indoor design saves you in the hot summer day!

Name: Oriental Pearl Tower
Description: A great place to enjoy the night scene in Shanghai, including the ligh shows around the Bund.
